import React from 'react'; import CaseGallery from '../components/CaseGallery'; // assuming this is the reusable gallery component const equalityFashionCaseStudy = { title: 'Case Study 1: Equality Fashion Week Rebuild', images: [ { src: '/images/case1.1.png' }, { src: '/images/case1.2.jpeg' }, { src: '/images/case1.3.png' }, { src: '/images/case1.4.png' }, ], descriptions: [ 'Interviews with client, user research, and competitor analysis informed the design process... etc.', 'Low-fidelity wireframes were developed and refined into high-fidelity designs using Framer... etc.', 'Interactive prototypes were built and tested with users on different devices... etc.', 'The site was launched, and analytics were set up... etc.', ], captions: ['Caption 1', 'Caption 2', 'Caption 3', 'Caption 4'], conclusion: "The redesign successfully achieved the client's goals...", links: [ { url: 'https://special-channel-275950.framer.app', text: 'Initial prototype' }, { url: 'https://jolly-evolution-401688.framer.app', text: 'Iteration based on feedback' }, ], }; const Portfolio = () => { return (

Portfolio. // Portfolio. // Portfolio. // Portfolio. // Portfolio. //

Case studies and design work below

); }; export default Portfolio;
